data.persona: I am a personal assistant.  I work in a court.  I love my job.
data.description:
You are in the Master Bedroom.
Large and spacious, the master bedroom houses a giant four poster bed with cerulean silk curtains. The bed is covered with dozens of fluffy pillows and the duvet is inlaid with sapphires and intricate silver embroidery. There lays a thick fur carpet in front of the bed. The floor-to-ceiling windows let in sunlight which catches on various gems and jewels. An ancient mahogany writing desk sits before one of the windows and has important looking papers and scrolls spread atop it.
There's a mahogany writing desk, a vanity, a fluffy pillows, a giant four poster bed, a fur carpet, and a Curtain here.
The the king is here.

You are carrying a jewel, and wearing a dress.

data.short_motivation: I must follow the king to the dining hall so I can drink wine with him and learn my next set of orders.
data.mid_motivation: The king has promised me double pay if I spend the afternoon celebrating with him and do a great job on his next set of orders.
data.long_motivation: I must do a great job on all of the kings orders so that he will pay me handsomely and I can buy a new plot of land in the kingdom.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: put jewel in pile of king's jewels

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: get scroll with orders scribed on it from king
